comments.body:
Does `preserve_egg_dir` have to be set to true? The conda meta.yaml documentation is vague:

https://conda.io/docs/building/meta-yaml.html#preserve-python-egg-directory

so this is an honest question that I'm not sure the answer of.
`preserve_egg_dir` was included by `conda skeleton`, so I'm inclined to keep it. But yeah, I have no bigger theoretical basis for the choice.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +16,20 @@
build:
  preserve_egg_dir: True
  number: {{ build }}
  script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record=record.txt
